conbody.p: The character encoding of <ptl_file> must be UTF-8. The character encoding of <log_file> can be ISO 8859-1 or one of the character encoding schemes you specify with the --data-char-encoding option. If not specified, the character encoding of log files processed by the atload command is assumed to be ISO 8859-1.

A list of supported character encodings displays.
